question: Show me all accounts
soql: SELECT Id, Name FROM Account
explanation: Basic query selecting standard fields from Account

question: List all contacts with their email addresses
soql: SELECT Id, FirstName, LastName, Email FROM Contact

question: Find opportunities worth more than 100000
soql: SELECT Id, Name, Amount FROM Opportunity WHERE Amount > 100000

question: Show me closed won opportunities
soql: SELECT Id, Name, Amount, CloseDate FROM Opportunity WHERE StageName = 'Closed Won'

question: Find accounts in New York or California
soql: SELECT Id, Name, BillingState FROM Account WHERE BillingState IN ('NY', 'CA')

question: Find contacts whose last name starts with Smith
soql: SELECT Id, FirstName, LastName FROM Contact WHERE LastName LIKE 'Smith%'

question: Show contacts with their account names
soql: SELECT Id, FirstName, LastName, Account.Name FROM Contact
explanation: Parent relationship traversal using dot notation

question: List opportunities with their account industry
soql: SELECT Id, Name, Amount, Account.Industry FROM Opportunity

question: Show cases with owner name and account name
soql: SELECT Id, Subject, Owner.Name, Account.Name FROM Case

question: Get accounts with their contacts
soql: SELECT Id, Name, (SELECT Id, FirstName, LastName FROM Contacts) FROM Account
explanation: Child relationship subquery using 'Contacts' relationship name

question: Show accounts with their opportunities
soql: SELECT Id, Name, (SELECT Id, Name, Amount FROM Opportunities) FROM Account

question: List opportunities with their line items
soql: SELECT Id, Name, (SELECT Id, Quantity, UnitPrice FROM OpportunityLineItems) FROM Opportunity

question: Find accounts that have at least one opportunity
soql: SELECT Id, Name FROM Account WHERE Id IN (SELECT AccountId FROM Opportunity)
explanation: Semi-join subquery to filter parent by child existence

question: Show contacts whose accounts are in the Technology industry
soql: SELECT Id, FirstName, LastName FROM Contact WHERE AccountId IN (SELECT Id FROM Account WHERE Industry = 'Technology')

question: Find opportunities where the account has more than 100 employees
soql: SELECT Id, Name, Amount FROM Opportunity WHERE AccountId IN (SELECT Id FROM Account WHERE NumberOfEmployees > 100)

question: Count the total number of accounts
soql: SELECT COUNT(Id) FROM Account

question: What is the total value of all opportunities?
soql: SELECT SUM(Amount) FROM Opportunity

question: Show the average opportunity amount by stage
soql: SELECT StageName, AVG(Amount) FROM Opportunity GROUP BY StageName
explanation: Aggregate with GROUP BY for per-stage analysis

question: Count opportunities per account
soql: SELECT Account.Name, COUNT(Id) FROM Opportunity GROUP BY Account.Name

question: Show total opportunity amount per industry
soql: SELECT Account.Industry, SUM(Amount) FROM Opportunity GROUP BY Account.Industry

question: Get the phone number if the event is related to an Account, or the amount if related to an Opportunity
soql: SELECT TYPEOF What WHEN Account THEN Phone WHEN Opportunity THEN Amount END FROM Event
explanation: TYPEOF syntax for polymorphic field resolution

question: Show tasks with the related account or contact name
soql: SELECT Id, Subject, TYPEOF WhoId WHEN Contact THEN FirstName, LastName WHEN Lead THEN Name END FROM Task

question: List events with what they're related to
soql: SELECT Id, Subject, What.Type, What.Name FROM Event WHERE What.Type IN ('Account', 'Opportunity')

question: Show opportunities closing this month
soql: SELECT Id, Name, CloseDate FROM Opportunity WHERE CloseDate = THIS_MONTH
explanation: SOQL date literal for current month

question: Find accounts created in the last 30 days
soql: SELECT Id, Name, CreatedDate FROM Account WHERE CreatedDate = LAST_N_DAYS:30

question: Show opportunities closing next quarter
soql: SELECT Id, Name, Amount, CloseDate FROM Opportunity WHERE CloseDate = NEXT_QUARTER

question: Find cases opened this fiscal year
soql: SELECT Id, Subject, CreatedDate FROM Case WHERE CreatedDate = THIS_FISCAL_YEAR

question: Show top 10 opportunities by amount
soql: SELECT Id, Name, Amount FROM Opportunity ORDER BY Amount DESC LIMIT 10

question: List the 5 most recently created accounts
soql: SELECT Id, Name, CreatedDate FROM Account ORDER BY CreatedDate DESC LIMIT 5

question: Show accounts with at least one closed-won opportunity in the last year
soql: SELECT Id, Name FROM Account WHERE Id IN (SELECT AccountId FROM Opportunity WHERE StageName = 'Closed Won' AND CloseDate = LAST_N_DAYS:365)

question: Find contacts at accounts with annual revenue over 1 million
soql: SELECT Id, FirstName, LastName, Email, Account.Name FROM Contact WHERE Account.AnnualRevenue > 1000000

question: Show opportunities with their products and account details
soql: SELECT Id, Name, Account.Name, Account.Industry, (SELECT Id, Product2.Name, Quantity FROM OpportunityLineItems) FROM Opportunity

question: Count open cases per account for accounts in California
soql: SELECT Account.Name, COUNT(Id) FROM Case WHERE Account.BillingState = 'CA' AND IsClosed = false GROUP BY Account.Name

question: Show accounts with their total opportunity pipeline and number of contacts
soql: SELECT Id, Name, (SELECT Id, Amount FROM Opportunities WHERE IsClosed = false), (SELECT Id FROM Contacts) FROM Account
explanation: Multiple child subqueries with filter in one query

question: Find contacts without an email address
soql: SELECT Id, FirstName, LastName FROM Contact WHERE Email = null

question: Show opportunities without an account
soql: SELECT Id, Name FROM Opportunity WHERE AccountId = null

question: Find high-value open opportunities from enterprise accounts
soql: SELECT Id, Name, Amount FROM Opportunity WHERE Amount > 50000 AND IsClosed = false AND Account.Type = 'Enterprise'

question: Show active contacts at accounts in the healthcare or finance industry
soql: SELECT Id, FirstName, LastName, Email FROM Contact WHERE Account.Industry IN ('Healthcare', 'Finance') AND IsActive__c = true

question: Show opportunities owned by John Smith
soql: SELECT Id, Name, Amount FROM Opportunity WHERE Owner.Name = 'John Smith'

question: Count opportunities per owner
soql: SELECT Owner.Name, COUNT(Id) FROM Opportunity GROUP BY Owner.Name

question: Show all products with their prices
soql: SELECT Id, Name, ProductCode, (SELECT UnitPrice, Pricebook2.Name FROM PricebookEntries) FROM Product2

question: List all users with their role
soql: SELECT Id, Name, Email, UserRole.Name FROM User WHERE IsActive = true

question: Show campaigns with their members
soql: SELECT Id, Name, (SELECT Id, ContactId, LeadId, Status FROM CampaignMembers) FROM Campaign

question: Count leads by campaign
soql: SELECT Campaign.Name, COUNT(LeadId) FROM CampaignMember WHERE LeadId != null GROUP BY Campaign.Name

question: Show all accounts with Business record type
soql: SELECT Id, Name FROM Account WHERE RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Business'

question: Show accounts with more than 5 contacts
soql: SELECT AccountId, Account.Name, COUNT(Id) FROM Contact GROUP BY AccountId, Account.Name HAVING COUNT(Id) > 5
explanation: HAVING clause to filter aggregated results

question: Show opportunities where Jane Smith is a contact
soql: SELECT Id, Name, Amount FROM Opportunity WHERE Id IN (SELECT OpportunityId FROM OpportunityContactRole WHERE Contact.Name = 'Jane Smith')
explanation: OpportunityContactRole links Opportunities to Contacts (external people like customers/stakeholders).

question: Find opportunities where Sarah Johnson is working on them
soql: SELECT Id, Name, Amount FROM Opportunity WHERE Id IN (SELECT OpportunityId FROM OpportunityTeamMember WHERE User.Name = 'Sarah Johnson')
explanation: OpportunityTeamMember links Opportunities to Users (internal team members working on the deal). Use for 'working on', 'collaborating', 'team member' queries.

question: Find opportunities owned by John Doe where Sarah Johnson is also working
soql: SELECT Id, Name, Amount FROM Opportunity WHERE Owner.Name = 'John Doe' AND Id IN (SELECT OpportunityId FROM OpportunityTeamMember WHERE User.Name = 'Sarah Johnson')
explanation: Owner.Name filters by the primary owner (User). OpportunityTeamMember filters by additional internal users working on the deal.

question: List opportunities with their contact roles
soql: SELECT Id, Name, (SELECT Id, Contact.Name, Role FROM OpportunityContactRoles) FROM Opportunity
explanation: Child subquery to get all contacts associated with each opportunity

question: Show contacts and the opportunities they are involved in
soql: SELECT Id, Name, (SELECT Opportunity.Name, Opportunity.Amount, Role FROM OpportunityContactRoles) FROM Contact
explanation: Reverse query: from Contact to their Opportunities via the junction table
